title: Reading through (BLANK)'s change history in the last two seasons absolutely disgusts me.
body:
*inserts change history of champion recently lost to*

This is pathetic. (BLANK) has received nothing but buffs since Season 6 and beyond. I hate this company.

replies.body: Make sure to include every change that all champions received and pretend they were the only champion buffed that patch.
ig the reason you wont name the champ is because you know the champ isn't broken at all.
